ZYSH SHENYANG FIR EMBD TS FCST W OF E120 TOP FL300 MOV E 20KMH NC ==

WSUS33 KKCI 082055 
SIGW  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 8W 
VALID UNTIL 2255Z 
MT ID WA 
FROM 40S YXC-20NW MLP-30E EPH-80NNW GEG-40S YXC 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 25015KT. TOPS TO FL300.

FROM 60NNW ISN-MTU-DTA-BKE-30S YDC-50SSW YQL-60NNW ISN 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
